metadata.title: CVE-2024-2616 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
To harden ICU against exploitation, the behavior for out-of-memoryconditions was changed to crash instead of attempt to continue. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.9 and Thunderbird < 115.9.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2616` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:115.9.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:115.9.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:115.9.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:115.9.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:115.9.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:115.9.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required
